content.html:
I promise I'm not working on vacation, but I had done some testing of this earlier this week and forgot to post it. I had trouble building and linking this on osx. I pushed my fixes in cddf379 to branch system_gui_plugin_update_scpeters. One is a capitalization issue in the CMakeLists.txt, the second issue is that not all the gazebo libraries are listed in the cmake/pkgconfig/gazebo.in file (though I believe the cmake config file has them all). Finally there's a compilation problem on osx if certain boost headers get included after a specific OSX header (https://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/ticket/5010); a workaround is to include math/Rand.hh first, and then it seems to work.

Also, when testing one of the wiki tutorials that has similar code to this example, I had some troubles during shutdown, so I added a destructor that turned of the camera frame grabbing. It may be relevant here too, though maybe we should also disconnect from the event? I'm not sure.

public: virtual ~SystemGUI()
    {
      if (this->userCam)
        this->userCam->EnableSaveFrame(false);
    }
